add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(libs-logbroker-topic_api_impl)
target_link_libraries(libs-logbroker-topic_api_impl PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  blockstore-libs-common
  blockstore-libs-diagnostics
  libs-logbroker-iface
  cpp-client-iam
  cpp-client-ydb_driver
  cpp-client-ydb_topic
  cpp-threading-future
)
target_sources(libs-logbroker-topic_api_impl PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/libs/logbroker/topic_api_impl/topic_api.cpp
)
